fulltext:
Contact
huydoanpham@yahoo.com
www.linkedin.com/in/huy- pham-99863661  (LinkedIn)
Top Skills
Sales Management
Sales Presentations
Team Management
Huy Pham
Senior Business Partnership
Vietnam
Summary
Good business sense with 8 years experienced 
- Understand internet market and products, familiar with start-up
challenges
- Effective communicator
- Self-motivated but able to work as part of a team
- Good organisational and time-management skills
- Good negotiation skills and persuasiveness
- Confidence presenting to large groups of people
- Trustworthiness and discretion when handling confidential
information
- Smart appearance and professional manner
- Positive attitude and enjoy networking
Experience
LINE Corp
Senior Business Partnership - BEYEU Project
June 2018 - Present 
Vietnam
Baby Love - a member of Line, is a free mobile app for moms. Based on the
baby's age from pregnancy to age 5, the app helps parents keep up with useful
information and questions raised by mothers of the same age.
- Structuring a deal includes: services and products and discount,
commissions, collaborative steps to ondeal.
- Support the sale to complete the discussion and signing with the merchant
when cooperating with BEYEU
- Responsible for operation and enforcement of the merchant in cooperation
with BEYEU
- Be responsible for partnering with BEYEU for the e-commerce channel as
well as the partner responsible for shipping.
- Cooperate with other departments to complete the assigned tasks such as
legal, accounting, marketing, technical, content, customer care.
Achievements:
Page 1 of 6
- Plans for the deal structure include: cooperative type and commission
- Cooperate with Legal and complete the following items: E-commerce
transaction platform licence, e-commerce project licence, promotion license
- Supported sale has completed two major campaigns for Unilever for the
OMO brand: Sampling (8000 combo) and Reward (8000 e-voucher). In
addition to the Beesmart smart toy product partners
Foodnow.vn
Founder
April 2016 - May 2018 (2 years 2 months)
Vietnam
Nowadays, people are living in busy society and they have got crazy life. 
Users want to save money and time for family, relationship, friends, job...
Merchants want to get more revenue and best solutions for business but lack
of, such as: manegment tool, employement and pay too much money for
marketing.
Foodnow.vn is food delivery website, we provide not only food delivery service
for user but also suppliers.  
We provide solution for all people and business. Beside,  we concentrate to
solve problems of society, such as: save time, money.
Foodnow will be become one of largest Supermarket online in Việt Nam.
Moreovers, We will connect all of suppliers to provide the best service for all of
Foodnow's member.
Cốc Cốc
Senior Sales
August 2016 - July 2017 (1 year)
27B Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Dakao Ward, District 1, HCMC
Sell QC Cốc Cốc ad placements
Develop and maintain partners database
Increase awareness of Cốc Cốc’s capabilities to existing and prospective
clients
Develop business—build and maintain good relationships with clients
Prepare attractive documents/presentations to inspire and persuade clients
Meet monthly and quarterly sales objectives
Collect market information for superiors to maximize business opportunities
Research and forecast new trends in the Vietnamese online advertising market
Collaborate with other teams to develop new products/services
Execute other tasks assigned by management
Achievement: 
Page 2 of 6
Best Seller in last quarter in 2016
DucNhung Company
Key Account Manager
July 2015 - June 2016 (1 year)
QuiNhon City and HoChiMinh City
Financial (KA channel):
Plan for sales cycle in Month to:
- Co-work with marketing, customer service, admin and production to
implement activities with customers
- Closely work with customers to ensure efficient operation
- Ensure best service to customers/consumers
- Co-work with customer to build the good business relation ship
Sales Management 
- Seek new key clients in various Electric industries.
- The presenting and business plan to customer.
- Participate in preparation for month trading terms contract with key
customers.
- Consult in the development of Sales tools and provide implementation
support to Director.
- Solve the problems in collaborative process to ensure the successful
cooperation
Communication
- Ensure clear and timely communication of all business related matter
- Provide consultant in all communication.
- Manage and maintain general communication and relation with key
customers.
Foody Corp
Project Manager
December 2014 - April 2015 (5 months)
Ho Chi Minh City
Using solid experience in ecommerce to set up operation of DeliveryNow
project
Supporting other departments: marketing, production and IT in operation tasks:
- Work out with Marketing departments for business development strategy
for DeliveryNow.vn in explore market planning, approach potential clients
strategy; 
- Collaborate with production department to solve the problem in company
process: brand image, service process
Page 3 of 6
- Manage sales department in deals source in both service and products, solve
the daily tasks another issues to be ensure for a smoothly business
Operation:
o In charge of deal quality management, quantity of deals for ecommerce
business, content of deals
- Set up the KPI and Policy for: Sale, Customer service, Editor, Delivery
departments
- Report performant every week 
Market Research:
- Research about the service, product: brand name, price, policies, market
demand
- Sourcing Privates Sales Products for Company inventory in Vietnam
- Manage and evolve restaurants and corporate relationships
Suppliers’ management
- Suppliers quality management in quality of service/ product, best price and
check for ability
- Manage and develop relationships with restaurant business
Sale Management
- Assist and work closely with business development team to source and
extend high quality, timely service to current and prospective restaurant in
Vietnam
- Define and manage requirements for day-to-day account management and
operations
- Other services as may be discussed and agreed to
- Ensure that all administration is completed as required
Achievement:
- After 2 months, we have 190 merchants signed the contract on over 274
merchants on the website
- Exceeding the set target 45%
- With over 50 orders per day
nhomMua.com
3 years 4 months
Key Account Manager
February 2013 - March 2014 (1 year 2 months)
Vietnam
Financial (KA channel):
- Plan for sales cycle in Month to:
- Co-work with marketing, customer service, admin and production to
implement activities with customers
Page 4 of 6
- Closely work with customers to ensure efficient operation
- Ensure best service to customers/consumers
- Co-work with customer to build the good business relation ship
Sales Management
- Seek new key clients: hospitality, beauty service, product (FMCG, fashion…)
- The presenting and business plan to customer.
- Participate in preparation for month trading terms contract with key
customers.
- Consulted in the development of Sales tools and provide implementation
support to Key Account team.
- Solve the problems in collaborative process to ensure the successful
cooperation
Communication
- Ensure clear and timely communication of all business related matter
- Provide consultant in all communication.
- Manage and maintain general communication and relation with key
customers.
Senior Account Executive - Team leader
December 2010 - June 2013 (2 years 7 months)
Vietnam
Head Office- Ho Chi Minh         Aug 2011- Jan 2013
- Training staff for understanding about the Groupon industry
- Responsible for sales team: support to find the merchant and achieved the
target of sale
- Seek new clients and market development: hospitality, beauty service,
product (FMCG, fashion…)
o Management information about goods and services of partners to ensure the
successful cooperation
o Solve the problems in collaborative process 
Achievement: Best seller in March, April and May, 2012
Hanoi Branch (6 months to set up branch at Hanoi)       Jan- Aug 2011
- Recruitment
- Training for staff: Groupon industry and structure DEAL
- Responsible for sales team
- Seek new clients and market development: hospitality, beauty service,
product (FMCG, fashion…) 
- Manage business situation: 
Page 5 of 6
o Research about the market in Hanoi: Consumer Behavior and Competitors
Collect customer’s opinions, analyze information and make plan for team to
attack the market
o Solve problems happen in during the time cooperation with merchant
o Report the market information for General Director of Market Development
- Find merchants for 5 market segments: Hotel & Resort, Restaurant, Spa
product and service
Ha Khue Company one of the partners of FPT Corporation
Sales Executive
March 2010 - December 2010 (10 months)
Vietnam
Sell products and collect opinions from customer
Solve the problems in collaborative process to ensure the successful
cooperation
The search for new customers and market development
Report the market information for Sale Manager
Education
St.Martin College
Advance Diploma of Business Management, Business Administration and
Management, General · (2006 - 2009)
AIA VietNam
Insurance Certificate, Insurance · (2014 - 2014)
